message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12500. I think this is a great deal, considering the value it brings. What do you think?
Alice, thank you for the offer.  I appreciate the value you're putting on this product, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10000.  Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand you're looking to spend closer to $10000, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11750. This is the best I can do, considering the value the product brings. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price. While $11750 is closer to my target, I'm still hoping we can find a price that works for both of us.  I'm willing to go up to $11000.  Would you be willing to consider that?

Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still not willing to go all the way down to $11000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $11250. This is the lowest I can go, considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
